function image$slider(){ 
	var str="<template tag-name='image-slider'>\n\t<div class=\"mainContent\">\n\t\t<input id=\"sliderSwitch\" class=\"sliderCheck\" type=\"checkbox\" name=\"sliderSwitch\"  onchange=\"{{action('autoplay')}}\" hidden />\t\n\t\t<div class=\"slider\">\n\t\t\t<div id=\"sliderList\" class=\"sliderList\">\t\n\t\t\t\t"; images.forEach(function(item, index){
